p: Overall, native populations of pure Prosopis species, putative hybrids from Argentina and Prosopis spp. individuals from South Africa had higher numbers of alleles per locus, levels of A R, H E and H O than native and non-native populations of P. juliflora and P. pallida and Australian putative hybrids ( Table 2; Fig. 2). Inbreeding coefficients ( F IS) were high in most native and non-native populations of Prosopis species. The number of private alleles was similar among native and non-native populations of Prosopis species and putative hybrids from Argentina ( Table 2).
